name: Dash 'n' Dart!
description:
This project is a short movement prototype made for round 1 of the GDKO Competition with a task of  "Create a player character with a unique ability."

I've made Dash n Dart in one week,  a game where you fire darts that you can jump and stomp on to reach amazing heights.

Controls

Keyboard 

Explained in game, though you can press 1 to toggle effects. 

Controller  (RECCOMENDED) 

 Dpad or stick to move

A button to jump (X on PS) 

X button to dash (Square on PS) 

B button to stomp (Circle on PS)

Trigger buttons to shoot darts

NOTE:  This game is only judged on character design and mechanic uniqueness this round.
